mapper.select: SELECT ST.SUBWAY_STATION_NAME, SE.ELEV_COUNT, SE.ESCA_COUNT, SE.MOVINGWALK_COUNT,SE.WCHAIR_LIFT_COUNT, SE.MV_SAFE_FOOT_COUNT, SE.WCHAIR_CHARGER_COUNT, SE.DISABLED_TOILET_COUNT, SE.VOICE_INDUCER_COUNT FROM SUBWAY_STATION_ESTA SE INNER JOIN (SELECT S.SUBWAY_STATION_INCODE, S.SUBLINE_NO,S.SUBWAY_STATION_NAME FROM SUBWAY_STATION S) ST ON SE.SUBWAY_STATION_INCODE = ST.SUBWAY_STATION_INCODE WHERE ST.SUBLINE_NO = #{sNo}
SELECT HAPPY_NO, SUBWAY_STATION_INCODE, LOCATION, AREA, OPERATING_AGENCY, PHONE_NUM, DEL_STATUS FROM HAPPY WHERE 1=1

SELECT SUBWAY_STATION_NAME, MAIN_PHONE_NUM,SUB.SUBLINE_NO,ES.NURSINGROOM FROM SUBWAY_STATION ST INNER JOIN SUBLINE SUB ON ST.SUBLINE_NO = SUB.SUBLINE_NO RIGHT OUTER JOIN SUBWAY_STATION_ESTA ES ON ST.SUBWAY_STATION_INCODE = ES.SUBWAY_STATION_INCODE WHERE SUB.SUBLINE_NO = 1 AND ES.NURSINGROOM = 1
